data.name: Vink Chemicals
data.description:
Vink Chemicals GmbH & Co. KG is your specialist for biocides and biocidal products . Vink Chemicals was founded in 2011 as a medium-sized family company based in Kakenstorf, Lower Saxony. With our specialization in the application-specific production of individual biocide formulations and tailor-made services around this topic, we close an important gap in the German and international biocide market.

We have a modern hazardous goods warehouse and our own facilities for the production of biocidal products according to the latest standards. Product development and quality control take place in our own laboratory. The trade in selected specialty chemicals rounds off our range perfectly.

data.name: parmetol
data.description: Water based benzisothiazolone (BIT) preparation Suitable for preservation of a broad range of water based products

data.name: grotan
data.description: Grotan® is a tank side biocide to control bacterial growth. The application is determined by size of sump. Recommended 10 oz per 50 gallons of mixed fluid.

data.name: grotanol
data.description: Microbiocidal system cleaner for circulation systems and production plants

data.name: parmetol® A 26 N
data.description: parmetol® A 26 N is a stabilized aqueous preparation featuring chloromethyl-/methylisothiazolone (CMI/MI) and reaction products of ethylene glycol, urea, and paraform, tailored for preserving a diverse range of water-based products. With its broad and balanced spectrum of effect against bacteria, yeasts, and molds, it ensures comprehensive protection, maintaining product integrity over time. Ideal for safeguarding manufactured goods, excluding foodstuffs, feedingstuffs, cosmetics, or medicinal products, parmetol® A 26 N effectively controls microbial deterioration, extending shelf life and ensuring quality preservation.

data.name: grotan® WS plus
data.description: grotan® WS plus is a water-miscible formulation based on the reaction product of paraformaldehyde with 2-hydroxypropylamine (ratio 1:1; HPT) and sodium pyrithione. Suitable for water-mixed metalworking fluids, metalworking fluid concentrates, and other technical emulsions, it offers broad, balanced efficacy against bacteria, yeasts, and molds, including sulfate-reducing bacteria. It provides good anticorrosion properties and is free of nitrate, nitrosing agents, or organically bound chlorine. grotan® WS plus is fully soluble in water and most polar organic solvents, making it a versatile option for preservation during storage and working or cutting fluid applications.

data.name: grotanol® 3025
data.description: grotanol® 3025 is a microbiocidal system cleaner based on glutaral and chloromethyl-/methylisothiazolone (3:1). It effectively combats bacteria, yeasts, and molds across anionic, cationic, and non-ionic systems, with low foaming and immediate action. Free of formaldehyde and solvents, it can be rinsed off without leaving residue and meets strict regulatory standards. Ideal for industrial settings like food-processing, pharmaceutical, and cosmetic industries, surfaces in contact with food must be rinsed with water after the recommended contact time.

data.name: parmetol® K 20
data.description: parmetol® K 20 is a bivalent stabilized aqueous preparation based on chloromethyl-/methylisothiazolone (CMI/MI), stabilized with copper and magnesium salts. It is suitable for preserving a broad range of water-based products, offering a broad spectrum of efficacy. parmetol® K 20 is free of VOCs and organic solvents. It is used for disinfecting surfaces, materials, equipment, and furniture, and for preserving products during storage. It is also used in liquid-cooling and processing systems, slimicides, and working or cutting fluid preservatives.

data.name: parmetol® K 6
data.description: parmetol® K 6 is an aqueous combination of chloromethyl/methylisothiazolone (CMI/MI) stabilized with copper and magnesium salts. It effectively preserves water-based products of various kinds, offering a broad spectrum of protection. Free from volatile organic compounds (VOC) and organic solvents, it ensures reliable and high-performance preservation without compromising environmental standards. It's suitable for preserving manufactured products and controlling microbial deterioration to extend their shelf life.

data.name: parmetol® MBX
data.description: parmetol® MBX is an aqueous formulation combining 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one (BIT), 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (MIT), and bis(3-aminopropyl)dodecylamine (BDA). This preservative acts swiftly, providing long-term protection and effectively reducing germ counts, especially in contaminated process water. It offers integrated production hygiene and is approved for Ecolabel standards like "European Flower" or "Nordic Ecolabel". Suitable for various applications, including storage preservation and slimicide control, it ensures microbial deterioration control in industrial processes.

data.name: grotan® OX
data.description: grotan® OX is an innovative biocide that offers outstanding performance at low doses for greater cost-efficiency. Suitable for water-mixed metalworking fluids, metalworking fluid concentrates, and other technical emulsions, it provides good anti-corrosion properties. Effective against bacteria, yeasts, and mold, it features a broad, balanced spectrum, including sulfate-reducing bacteria, with good immediate effects. grotan® OX contains no nitrate, nitrosing agents, or organically bound chlorine, ensuring no impact on the AOX value. It is used in preserving products during storage, liquid-cooling and processing systems, slimicides, and working or cutting fluid preservatives.

data.name: grotanol® FF 1 N
data.description: grotanol® FF 1 N presents a powerful microbiocidal system cleaner harnessing the synergistic blend of 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one (BIT), bis(3-aminopropyl)dodecylamin (BDA), and sodium pyrithione. Specifically designed for metalworking fluid systems, it can be seamlessly integrated into emulsions before the final shift, ensuring thorough circulation. Boasting exceptional microbiological efficacy, it offers a broad, balanced spectrum of action against bacteria, yeasts, and molds. Its immediate effect and impressive anticorrosion properties make it a reliable choice for all steel, non-ferrous, and aluminum alloys. Importantly, it contains no organically bound chlorine, preserving environmental integrity. grotanol® FF 1 N is an indispensable solution for disinfecting surfaces, materials, and equipment, ideal for various professional and industrial applications, from swimming pools to air conditioning systems.

data.name: parmetol® K 11
data.description: parmetol® K 11 is a copper stabilized combination of isothiazolones, water based combination of chloromethyl-/ methylisothiazolone (CMI/ MI).

data.name: Vinkocide
data.seo_description: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of sellers and buyers every day.

data.name: Vinkocide® I 20
data.description: Vinkocide® I 20 is a biocide designed for industrial additives.

data.name: Vinkocide® I 30
data.description: Vinkocide® I 30 is a biocide designed for industrial additives.

data.name: Vinkocide® 824
data.description: Vinkocide® 824 is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). It penetrates microorganism cells, reacting with vital components and enzymes, thus disrupting normal cell function and preventing microbial adaptation. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, it proves effective even where other preservatives fail, particularly against Gram-negative bacteria. Combining excellent long-term efficacy with rapid action, Vinkocide® 824 is cost-effective due to its low use levels. Additionally, as it contains a formaldehyde releaser, it provides headspace protection in all types of in-can preservation. It's ideal for use in aqueous and water-miscible systems and finds applications in preserving manufactured products to ensure their shelf life, as well as in controlling microbial deterioration in various industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® 825
data.description: Vinkocide® 825 is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). This compound penetrates microorganism cells, disrupting vital components and enzymes essential for normal cell function, thus preventing microbial adaptation. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, it is highly effective, particularly against Gram-negative bacteria, often where other preservatives fail. Vinkocide® 825 is cost-effective due to its low use levels and combines excellent long-term efficacy with rapid action. Additionally, as it contains a formaldehyde releaser, it provides headspace protection in all types of in-can preservation. It is ideal for use in aqueous and water-miscible systems, suitable for preserving manufactured products, and controlling microbial deterioration in various industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® 836
data.description: Vinkocide® 836 is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). This compound effectively penetrates microorganism cells, targeting vital components and enzymes, thereby disrupting normal cell function and preventing microbial adaptation. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, it demonstrates effectiveness, particularly against Gram-negative bacteria, often succeeding where other preservatives fail. Vinkocide® 836 is cost-effective due to its low use levels and combines excellent long-term efficacy with rapid action. Additionally, as it contains a formaldehyde releaser, it provides headspace protection in all types of in-can preservation. It is suitable for use in aqueous and water-miscible systems and finds application in preserving manufactured products, ensuring their shelf life, and controlling microbial deterioration in various industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® BAC 50
data.description: Vinkocide® BAC 50 is a quaternary ammonium-based biocide, with various alkyl chain lengths. Its mechanism disrupts cellular membrane lipid bilayers, compromising permeability controls and inducing leakage of cellular contents, leading to microbial deactivation. With rapid action and moderate duration, it maintains efficacy across a broad pH range and temperatures up to 120°C. It exhibits virucidal activity against enveloped viruses like HBV, HCV, HIV, influenza viruses, coronaviruses (MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV-1, SARS-CoV-2), and filoviruses (Ebola virus). Offering good surfactant properties, it can be formulated with other surfactants. With broad antimicrobial efficacy against bacteria, yeast, and enveloped viruses, it's VOC-free, soluble in water and alcohols, and readily biodegradable, suitable for various disinfection and preservation applications.

data.name: Vinkocide® BB WM
data.description: Vinkocide® BB WM is a preservative designed for metalworking fluids. This low-foaming liquid prevents bacterial growth, offers good thermal stability, and is VOC-free and amine-free.

data.name: Vinkocide® BDA 30
data.description: Vinkocide® BDA 30 is a liquid biocide and preservative designed for varnishes. It is aldehyde-free, halogen-free, and offers good compatibility. Additionally, it functions as a bactericide in both CASE ingredients and industrial additives.

data.name: Vinkocide® BF 56
data.description: Vinkocide® BF 56 is a formulation combining 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3-one (BIT) and (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol. Designed for challenging preservation tasks, it's effective in applications resistant to typical methods. The blend enhances efficacy, especially where isothiazolones alone lack potency. It's ideal for aqueous systems, boasting a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. Known for stability, it offers headspace preservation and long-term efficacy. Compatible with various materials, it's a clear, aqueous solution suited for diverse preservation needs.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT 10
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT 10 is an aqueous formulation of 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one (BIT). Often used as the sole preservative, it can also be combined with other biocides to enhance fungicidal efficacy based on specific conditions and applications. Highly suitable for preserving aqueous products, it offers stability in a wide pH range (3-13) and at high temperatures. Its broad spectrum activity controls bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, while remaining stable in the presence of amines. With a non-specific mode of action, it reduces microbial resistance potential. Easy to handle in liquid form, it exhibits excellent compatibility in most aqueous compositions. When used with co-biocides like CMI/MI, bronopol, or formaldehyde releasers, it enhances performance and reduces costs. Non-volatile and heat-stable, it can be incorporated into hot fluids. Its high purity is reflected in its clear, light color.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT 10 G
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT 10 G is an aqueous-glycolic solution containing 10% 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3-one (BIT) as the active ingredient. It is often sufficient as the sole preservative, although combining it with other biocides can enhance fungicidal efficacy in certain conditions and applications. Highly suitable for preserving various aqueous products, Vinkocide® BIT 10 G offers excellent stability in a broad pH range (3-13) and at high temperatures. Compatibility with most products and raw materials is generally excellent, but individual formulations should be tested for stability. It is ideal for use in aqueous and water miscible systems, offering a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. Furthermore, it is free from formaldehyde, formaldehyde releasers, phenolics, heavy metals, or halogens, ensuring excellent chemical stability and long-term efficacy. It also exhibits good compatibility with other raw materials.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT 20 D
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT 20 D is an aqueous dispersion containing 20% 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one (BIT) with a low pH. This preservative offers a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts without containing harmful substances like formaldehyde. With excellent chemical stability and long-term efficacy, it is suitable for various aqueous products, demonstrating compatibility with most raw materials. Its applications include preservation for manufactured goods, slimicides, and working fluid preservatives.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT 20 G
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT 20 G is a solution containing 20% 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one (BIT), a versatile preservative with a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. It is free from formaldehyde and other harmful substances, ensuring chemical stability and long-term efficacy. Highly suitable for aqueous systems, it offers excellent compatibility and stability, making it ideal for various applications, including as a preservative for manufactured products, slimicides, and working fluid preservatives.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT 20 PG
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT 20 PG, based on 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3(2H)-one, offers broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. Ideal for aqueous and water-miscible systems, it ensures chemical stability and long-term efficacy. Free from formaldehyde, formaldehyde releasers, phenolics, heavy metals, or halogens, it exhibits good compatibility with other raw materials. While often effective as a standalone preservative, it can be combined with other biocides for enhanced fungicidal efficacy, making it suitable for various preservation applications including storage, slimicides, and working or cutting fluid preservatives.

data.name: Vinkocide® BIT PE
data.description: Vinkocide® BIT PE is a liquid preservative suitable for household and industrial cleaners, detergents, waterborne adhesives, sealants, coatings, and inks. It functions as an anti-microbial agent, biocide, fungicide, and prevents phase separation, gas, and odor build-up. It offers excellent stability, viscosity stability, and chemical stability. It is formaldehyde-free, halogen-free, heavy metal-free, and phenol formaldehyde-free, making it suitable for various substrates like leather and textiles. Additionally, it is non-phenolic and resistant to bacteria, fungi, yeast, and molds, ensuring good long-term efficiency.

data.name: Vinkocide® BND 20
data.description: Vinkocide® BND 20 utilizes 2-bromo-2-nitropropane-1,3-diol (Bronopol) as its active ingredient, effective against bacteria and slime-forming organisms. It demonstrates versatility by being compatible with various biocides, particularly isothiazolones. With stability up to pH 8 and temperatures of 40°C, it's suitable for aqueous products, showing low sensitization potential. Its applications include preservation in manufacturing, slimicides, and liquid-cooling systems.

data.name: Vinkocide® BTL
data.description: Vinkocide® BTL combines 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (MIT) with Bronopol for enhanced preservation. Offering fast action and long-term efficacy, this formulation is effective in challenging preservation applications. Bronopol stabilizes isothiazolones, broadening their antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. With excellent chemical stability and compatibility with various raw materials, it's suitable for aqueous systems and industrial processes, including storage preservation and slimicide control.

data.name: Vinkocide® CD 30
data.description: Vinkocide® CD 30 combines carbendazim and diuron, offering protection against algal and fungal attacks on surface coatings and building chemical products. Ideal for outdoor applications, it ensures excellent stability and long-term efficacy while being free from heavy metals, organic solvents, and VOCs. Compatible with most raw materials for water-based products, it effectively preserves dry paint films and coatings, preventing microbial deterioration and maintaining material properties over time.

data.name: Vinkocide® CDO
data.description: Vinkocide® CDO combines carbendazim, diuron, and 2-n-Octyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (OIT) for effective protection against algal and fungal attacks on surface coatings and building chemical products. Specifically designed for outdoor applications, it ensures excellent stability and long-term efficacy while being free from heavy metals, organic solvents, and VOCs. Compatible with most raw materials for water-based products, it is ideal for preserving dry paint films and coatings, safeguarding material properties in various environments.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5 is a bivalent stabilized formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT). This aqueous solution, with 1.5% CMIT/MIT, meets the highest purity standards, minimizing impurities' impact on efficacy and toxicity. It penetrates microorganism cells, inactivating vital substrates and enzymes, preventing microbial adaptation. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum and excellent long-term efficacy, it's ideal for aqueous systems, including storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working fluid preservation.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5 +
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5 ++ is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT). This aqueous solution, with 1.5% CMIT/MIT, is magnesium and copper stabilized, meeting the highest purity standards to minimize impurities' impact on efficacy and toxicity. It effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum and excellent long-term efficacy, it's suitable for various aqueous systems, including storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working fluid preservation.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5 M
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 1.5 M is a monovalent stabilized formulation comprising a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT). This aqueous solution, containing 1.5% CMIT/MIT, meets the highest purity standards, minimizing impurities' impact on efficacy and toxicity. It effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. With a broad antimicrobial spectrum and excellent long-term efficacy, it's suitable for various aqueous systems, especially those sensitive to bivalent metal ions, including storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working fluid preservation.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 14
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 14 is a bivalent stabilized formulation comprising 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT). This aqueous solution, containing 14% CIT/MIT, meets stringent purity standards to minimize impurities' impact on efficacy and toxicity. Its broad antimicrobial spectrum effectively combats bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, even surpassing other preservatives. Free from formaldehyde and phenolics, it ensures good chemical stability and long-term efficacy. Ideal for aqueous systems, it's widely used in various preservation applications, including storage, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working fluid preservation.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 14 +
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 14 ++ is a stabilized aqueous solution containing 14% CMIT/MIT, ideal for preserving a wide range of products. It effectively targets bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, penetrating microbial cells to disrupt vital functions. Free from formaldehyde and phenolics, it ensures high purity and stability. Its broad-spectrum efficacy makes it suitable for various applications, including liquid-cooling systems, rodenticides, and slimicides. The choice of stabilizing salts influences its efficiency, with copper salts enhancing performance. This versatile biocide offers long-term efficacy and is compatible with aqueous systems, making it a reliable choice for microbial control in industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMI 14 M
data.description: Vinkocide® CMI 14 M is a monovalent stabilized mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT), offered as an aqueous solution with a 14% concentration. It adheres to stringent purity standards to minimize impurities that could lead to undesired effects. By penetrating microbial cells and disrupting vital cellular functions, it prevents microbial adaptation and effectively preserves various aqueous and water-miscible systems. Its broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity covers bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, making it a reliable choice even in formulations sensitive to bivalent metal ions. Free from formaldehyde, formaldehyde releasers, and phenolics, it ensures stability and efficacy without compromising safety or environmental standards. Vinkocide® CMI 14 M is suitable for a wide range of preservation applications, including products storage, liquid-cooling and processing systems, slimicides, and working or cutting fluid preservatives.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB 25
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB 25 is a formulation containing a mixture of CMIT/MIT and Bronopol. It effectively penetrates microbial cells, disrupting vital functions and preventing microbial adaptation. Ideal for aqueous systems, it offers a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. Free from VOCs and organic solvents, it prevents phase separation, odor buildup, and changes in viscosity. Cost-effective with low use levels, it ensures long-term efficacy and rapid action, making it suitable for various preservation applications, including liquid-cooling systems, rodenticides, and slimicides.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB DBNPA
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB-DBNPA is a formulation combining 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with Bronopol and 2,2-dibromo-2-cyanoacetamide. This preservative provides a broad spectrum of activity, particularly effective as a slimicide in paper production and in-can preservation in the paper industry. Free of formaldehyde, it offers enhanced efficacy, especially against Pseudomonas species, ensuring the preservation of aqueous systems and controlling microbial deterioration in various industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB SE
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB SE is a formulation containing CMIT/MIT and Bronopol with reduced CMI content. It effectively penetrates microbial cells, inactivating vital functions and preventing microbial adaptation. Suitable for aqueous systems, it exhibits a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts, with enhanced efficacy against Pseudomonas species. VOC-free and cost-effective, it ensures long-term efficacy and rapid action, complying with various eco-labels. It's ideal for preserving manufactured products, liquid-cooling systems, and preventing slime growth in industrial processes.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB-SS
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB-SS is a formulation combining 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with Bronopol, featuring a slightly elevated Bronopol concentration. This solution effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. Ideal for aqueous systems, it demonstrates broad antimicrobial spectrum, particularly effective against Pseudomonas species. Free of VOCs and organic solvents, it ensures excellent long-term efficacy and complies with various ecolabels like "Blue Angel" or "European Flower." Compatible with most products, it's recommended for use in storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, and slimicide applications.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB SSM
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB SSM is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with Bronopol. This monovalent stabilized solution effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. It offers a rapid mode of action and demonstrates a broad antimicrobial spectrum, particularly effective against Pseudomonas species. Free of VOCs and organic solvents, it's suitable for use in aqueous systems, especially those sensitive to bivalent metal ions. Complying with various ecolabels like "Blue Angel" or "European Flower," it ensures excellent long-term efficacy and is recommended for storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, and slimicide applications.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB-WA
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB-WA is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with Bronopol. This solution effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. It offers a rapid mode of action and demonstrates a broad antimicrobial spectrum, particularly effective against Pseudomonas species. Free of VOCs and organic solvents, it's suitable for use in aqueous systems. With excellent long-term efficacy and compliance with various ecolabels like "Blue Angel" or "European Flower," it's recommended for storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, and slimicide applications.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIB-WK
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIB-WK is a formulation containing a mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazol-3-one and 2-methyl-2H-isothiazol-3-one (CMIT/MIT) with Bronopol. This solution, with an increased level of Bronopol, effectively penetrates microorganism cells, preventing microbial adaptation by inactivating vital substrates and enzymes. It offers a rapid mode of action and demonstrates a broad antimicrobial spectrum, particularly effective against Pseudomonas species. Free of VOCs and organic solvents, it's suitable for use in aqueous systems. With excellent long-term efficacy and compliance with various ecolabels like "Blue Angel" or "European Flower," it's recommended for storage preservation, liquid-cooling systems, and slimicide applications. However, compatibility testing is recommended, especially for formulations with high pH (> 9) or containing certain sulfur-containing compounds.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIF
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIF is a formulation of CMIT/MIT with (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). It effectively penetrates microbial cells, disrupting vital functions to prevent microbial adaptation. With a formaldehyde releaser, it provides headspace protection in in-can preservation. It has a rapid mode of action, broad antimicrobial spectrum, especially potent against Gram-negative bacteria. Ideal for aqueous systems, but compatibility testing is advised for high pH formulations. Suitable for various applications including preservation during storage, liquid-cooling, slimicides, and working fluids.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIF 14
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIF 14 is a formulation containing CMIT/MIT and (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). It effectively disrupts microbial cell function, preventing microbial adaptation. With a formaldehyde releaser, it offers headspace protection in in-can preservation. It has a rapid mode of action and is effective against a broad spectrum of microorganisms, including Gram-negative bacteria. Ideal for use in aqueous systems. Compatibility testing is recommended for formulations with pH > 9 or sulfur-containing compounds. Not compatible with strong acids or oxidizing agents. Suitable for various preservation applications, including products during storage, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working fluids.

data.name: Vinkocide® CMIF 35
data.description: Vinkocide® CMIF 35 is a formulation comprising CMIT/MIT and (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol (EDDM). It effectively disrupts microbial cell function, preventing microbial adaptation. With a formaldehyde releaser, Vinkocide® CMIF 35 provides headspace protection in all types of in-can preservation. Compatibility testing is recommended for formulations with pH > 9 or containing certain sulfur-containing compounds. (Ethylenedioxy)dimethanol is incompatible with strong acids and oxidizing agents. This product is suitable for aqueous and water-miscible systems, offering a broad antimicrobial spectrum against bacteria, fungi, and yeasts. It is particularly effective against Gram-negative bacteria and is cost-effective due to low usage levels. Vinkocide® CMIF 35 is ideal for various preservation applications, including products during storage, liquid-cooling systems, slimicides, and working or cutting fluid preservatives.

data.name: Vinkocide® I 10
data.description: Vinkocide® I 10 is a biocide designed for industrial additives.

data.name: Vink Chemicals
data.description:
Vink Chemicals GmbH & Co. KG is your specialist for biocides and biocidal products . Vink Chemicals was founded in 2011 as a medium-sized family company based in Kakenstorf, Lower Saxony. With our specialization in the application-specific production of individual biocide formulations and tailor-made services around this topic, we close an important gap in the German and international biocide market.

We have a modern hazardous goods warehouse and our own facilities for the production of biocidal products according to the latest standards. Product development and quality control take place in our own laboratory. The trade in selected specialty chemicals rounds off our range perfectly.

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

FEATURED_SUPPLIERS.LARGEST_SUPPLIERS: The largest suppliers at your fingertips.

HERO.EASIEST_WAY_TO_SOURCE: The easiest way to source ingredients, polymers and chemistry.
HERO.SEARCH_SAMPLE_QUOTE: Search, sample, quote and purchase from 8,000+ suppliers

LATEST_SUPPLIERS.HEADING: Discover over 200k products in more than 8,000 storefronts.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

EXPERTS_PAGE.TITLE: {companyName} experts - Knowde
EXPERTS_PAGE.WE_CAN_GUIDE_YOU: We can guide you to the best product for your application and answer any questions.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.ORDER_LIMITS: (** Minimum order quantities may apply and exceed standard PRIMETIME Flavors minimum orders. Certain applications excluded.)

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
